summary: This is an email chain from October 16, 2019, regarding the scheduling of a meeting titled 'Epstein - Financial Update'. The meeting is set for October 24, 2019, at 290 Broadway, 9th floor Criminal conference room, and is organized by a Forensic Accountant from the FBI New York Field Office. Participants are coordinating their attendance.

persons.name: C S
persons.context: A participant in the email chain who confirms the meeting time works for them and asks if others are good with it.

events.title: Epstein - Financial Update Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled by an FBI Forensic Accountant to discuss financial updates related to the Epstein case.

locations.context: Location of the scheduled 'Epstein - Financial Update' meeting, likely an FBI or federal office.

keyFacts: An FBI Forensic Accountant from the New York Field Office scheduled a meeting titled 'Epstein - Financial Update' for October 24, 2019.
The meeting location was set at 290 Broadway, 9th floor Criminal conference room in New York.
Email correspondence on October 16, 2019, shows coordination among participants (C S, M, and others) regarding their attendance, with one participant stating they will be on trial.
The document indicates active financial investigation into the Epstein case by the FBI in October 2019.
